ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
1/2 cup fresh mint leaves, finely chopped
des: "Fresh mint, dark greens, cucumber and a delicious mix of lemon and olive oil make this a wonderfully cool and refreshing salad that I find perfect for any time."
ins: In a medium salad bowl, stir together the lemon juice, sugar, olive oil, salt, and pepper until the sugar is dissolved. Add the salad greens, mint, and cucumber to the bowl and toss to coat.
